snippet: In response to Carl C. Icahn’s announcement that he had built up a roughly 10 percent stake in Netflix, the company said it is open to his perspective on how to build success.
abstract: In response to Carl C. Icahn’s announcement that he had built up a roughly 10 percent stake in Netflix, the company said it is open to his perspective on how to build success.

headline.main: Netflix Says It Is Open to Icahn's 'Perspective'
